Package gutek.gui.controls

Class DeckCell

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.control.Control
javafx.scene.control.Labeled
javafx.scene.control.Cell<DeckBase>
javafx.scene.control.IndexedCell<DeckBase>
javafx.scene.control.ListCell<DeckBase>
gutek.gui.controls.DeckCell
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
public class DeckCell extends javafx.scene.control.ListCell<DeckBase>
Custom cell for displaying `DeckBase` objects within a ListView. Each cell uses a `DeckCellFXMLController` to handle the display of a `DeckBase` object.

  • Constructor Details

    • DeckCell

      public DeckCell(TranslationService translationService, MainStage stage, FXMLFileLoader fxmlFileLoader, DeckService deckService, DecksFXMLController parentController)
      Constructs a new `DeckCell` with the required dependencies to display a `DeckBase`.
      Parameters:
      translationService - Service for handling translations within the cell
      stage - Main application stage, used for switching scenes if needed
      fxmlFileLoader - Utility for loading FXML files
      deckService - Service for managing deck-related operations
      parentController - Reference to the parent `DecksFXMLController` for coordination

  • Method Details

    • updateItem

      protected void updateItem(DeckBase deck, boolean empty)
      Updates the content of the cell to display the provided `DeckBase` object, or clears it if empty.
      Overrides:
      updateItem in class javafx.scene.control.Cell<DeckBase>
      Parameters:
      deck - The `DeckBase` object to display in this cell
      empty - Whether this cell should be empty (true) or not (false)
